description: a(n) is the least k in A002977 with a gap of n. Also n + a(n) is the least k in A007448 which is repeated n times.
mathematica: k = {1}; Do[ k = Union[ Join[ k, 2k + 1, 3k + 1 ] ]; l = Length[ k ]; i = 1; While[ i < l && k[ [ i ] ] < 10^9, i++ ]; k = Take[ k, {1, i} ], {n, 1, 30} ]; f[ n_Integer ] := (i = 1; While[ k[ [ i + 1 ] ] - k[ [ i ] ] != n, i++ ]; k[ [ i ] ]); Table[ f[ n ], {n, 1, 84} ]
